transportation -- of all sorts...

Over the years, people have had a lot of different ways of getting around (or spending energy to stay in one place). Here are a few methods of transportation from our photo collection. We are always interested in new, old or creative methods of movement so please let us know if you can add any photos to this family archive. Click on the thumbnail view here to see a larger version of the picture. Then click "back" on your browser to return to this page.
